Switch.name: size
Switch.description: Renders the Switch at a different sizes.

Switch.name: active
Switch.description: Renders the Switch with aria-pressed attribute, and styles the Switch as if it where being clicked.

Switch.name: disabled
Switch.description: Renders the Switch with disabled attribute, and styles the Switch partially transparent.

Switch.name: name
Switch.description: Sets the form name of the Switch.

Switch.name: state
Switch.description: Sets the checked state of the Switch.

Switch.name: value
Switch.description: Sets the value sent whenever the parent <form> is submitted.

data.render:
Switch

Switch is typically used to present to the end-user features, settings, and other toggles that they can turn on / off.

Imports

<script>
    import {Switch} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

States

You can control the state of the Switch via the active, disabled, and state properties.

Palette

You can change the color palette of the Switch via the palette property.

Size

You can change the size of the Switch via the size property.
